title: Zymo-Research/aladdin-rnaseq pipeline parameters
description: Nextflow RNA-Seq analysis pipeline, part of the Zymo Research bioinformatics pipeline catalog

group.description: Group lables for comparison such as differential gene expression analysis between groups. Alphanumerical characters only. Must start with letter.

input_output_options.title: Input/output options
input_output_options.description: Define where the pipeline should find input data and save output data

design.description: Path to a design CSV file with sample & group labels, and paths to reads files

merged_counts.description: Path to a TSV file with read counts of genes in all samples

salmon_results.description: Path to a folder containing Salmon quantification results of all samples

outdir.description: The output directory where the results will be saved

reference_genome_options.title: Reference genome options
reference_genome_options.description: Options for the reference genome indices used to align reads

genome.description: Reference genome used to align reads. If your genome is not listed, please use the Contact us form to request help or create an issue on the GitHub repo of aladdin-rnaseq.

ercc_spikein.description: Whether ERCC spike-in was used. Choose 0 if not used. Choose 1 or 2 for Mixture 1 or 2, respectively

read_trimming_options.title: Read trimming options
read_trimming_options.description: Options to adjust read trimming criteria

protocol.description: Library prep protocol/kit used. If your kit is not listed, please use Contact us form to request help or create an issue on the GitHub repo of aladdin-rnaseq.

trim_nextseq.description: Whether to trim erroneous Gs at 3' end that are common on NextSeq or NovaSeq platforms. Choose this if your data come from these two platforms.

adapter_overlap.description: Overlap with adapter sequence required to trim a sequence

min_read_length.description: Minimum read length for a read to be kept after trimming

save_trimmed.description: Whether to save FASTQ files post-trimming

skip_trimming.description: Whether to skip trimming step completely, this also includes BBDuk step

skip_bbduk.description: Whether to skip BBDuk step, which removes reads with low complexity

bbduk_entropy.description: Entropy threshold for removing low complexity reads by BBDuk

bbduk_entropy_window.description: Size of window in bp for calculating entropy in BBDuk

alignment_options.title: Alignment options
alignment_options.description: Options to adjust parameters and filtering criteria for read alignments

save_secondary_alignments.description: Whether to save secondary alignments. By default, only primary alignments are saved

star_min_overlap.description: Minimum overlap between R1 and R2 for merging R1 and R2 in STAR

star_max_overlap_mismatch.description: Maximum mismatch ratio in the overlap region for merging overlapping paired-end reads in STAR

star_twopass.description: Whether to use two-pass mode in STAR

percent_mapped_cutoff.description: The minimum percentage of reads mapped required for a sample to proceed past alignment

read_counting_options.title: Read counting options
read_counting_options.description: Options to adjust parameters to assign reads to genes

read_quant_method.description: Method of read quantification. The main difference between the two are that STAR_Salmon uses multi-mapped reads and provide transcript-level quantification while STAR_featureCounts does not. STAR_Salmon requires that reads mostly overlap with transcripts, but STAR_featureCounts only requires partial overlap with any exon.

fc_extra_attributes.description: Define which extra attributes should also be included in featureCounts output

fc_group_features.description: Define the attribute used to group features

fc_count_type.description: Define the feature used to assign reads

fc_biotype_count_type.description: Define the feature used to assign reads in the biotype analysis

fc_biotype_group_features.description: Define the attribute used to group features in the biotype analysis

gene_detection_method.description: Define which method is used to calculate numbers of genes detected

process_skipping_options.title: Process skipping options
process_skipping_options.description: Options to skip various quality control steps in the workflow

skip_qc.description: Skip all QC steps except MultiQC

comparison_options.title: Comparison options
comparison_options.description: Options to adjust parameters used in group comparisons

skip_deseq2.description: skip DESeq2 and all group comparison analysis and plots

deseq2_fdr.description: FDR cutoff for differential gene expression analysis in DESeq2

deseq2_lfc.description: Log2FoldChange cutoff for DESeq2, please use log2 of desired fold change cutoff

comparisons.description: Path to a CSV file stating the sample groups you want to compare. If not provided, all pairwise comparisons will be carried out

gprofiler_fdr.description: FDR cutoff for pathway enrichment analysis in gProfiler

dtu_analysis.description: Run differential transcript usage analysis. This does not work for prokaryotes which does not have multiple transcripts per gene.

dexseq_fdr.description: FDR cutoff for differential transcript usage analysis in DEXSeq

prop_filter_transcript_counts.description: Filtering criteria for DTU analysis. Minimum proportion of samples that a transcript must have >=10 reads

prop_filter_transcript_props.description: Filtering criteria for DTU analysis. Minimum proportion of samples that a transcript must have >=10% of the reads of its gene

prop_filter_gene_counts.description: Filtering criteria for DTU analysis. Minimum proportion of samples that the gene of a transcript must have >=10 reads

heatmap_group_order.description: Orders the Top Gene Expression Patterns Heatmap by group label instead of similarity between samples

max_job_request_options.title: Max job request options
max_job_request_options.description: Set the top limit for requested resources for any single job

max_cpus.description: Maximum number of CPUs that can be requested for any single job

max_memory.description: Maximum amount of memory that can be requested for any single job

max_time.description: Maximum amount of time that can be requested for any single job

generic_options.title: Generic options
generic_options.description: Less common options for the pipeline, typically set in a config file

name.description: Name for the pipeline run. If not specified, Nextflow will automatically generate a random mnemonic

help.description: Whether to display the help message

multiqc_config.description: Path to a MultiQC config file for RNAseq workflow

aladdin_genomes_path.description: Path to genome assets made for Aladdin

igenomes_path.description: Path to genome assets hosted in iGenomes
